NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 THATCH: Filix, I shall be returning to the Gravity Cannon on Brittle Hollow shortly for supplies. Please allow me to know if it is safe to recall the shuttle! 2 1 FILIX: Do not recall your shuttle! The second shuttle is resting here at the Gravity Cannon right now! 3 2 THATCH: I shall wait! But.. what might transpire, if a shuttle were to be recalled into a space occupied by a second craft? 4 3 FILIX: My gratitude for your patience. Kousa is preparing a last shipment of gravity crystals for the new Gravity Cannon on Ember Twin; I shall not miss the looming pressure of sharing a single cannon between two shuttles.. 5 3 FILIX: We are incredibly fortunate to have been careful enough thus far to avoid such a scenario. The returning shuttle would warp into the obstructed space, explosively tearing both shuttles apart! 6 5 FILIX: Anyone aboard the shuttle would surely sustain grievous injuries - and many more could be endangered, if the explosion were to shake the Gravity Cannon and its dwellings into the black hole. 7 6 THATCH: My goodness! I shall make sure to remind the others to follow protocol, so we may never experience this terrible possibility.. You have my gratitude for overseeing the safety of everyone, Filix!
